item.title: Cold Brew Yerba Mate
item.description: Thermometers are already hitting 29Â°C with temperature feelings around 32 or 33. Itâ€™s this time of the year when I need cold drinks to keep me alive. Iâ€™m not a big soda fan (except when Iâ€™m on Finland in the Nordic Go AcademyÂ camp, they are so stocked on soda that Iâ€™m dragged in,) so my go-to drink is usually freshly squeezed lemonade with some ice cubes and sometimes a pinch of soda to make it fizz (and make it less acid.
